title: Like Father, Like Daughter
description: Alex and the guys drive a Taxi from New York City to Miami so that Alex can see his daughter, whom he hasn't seen in 15 years, before she leaves for school in Portugal.

title: One-Punch Banta
description: Tony gets a chance to spar with a world champion. And when he knocks the man down, he gets a bout with a ranked fighter. Everyone but Louie supports him. But before the fight he learns what really happened between him and the champ.

title: Blind Date
description: Alex goes on a blind date with Angela, whose name he only knows from the phone. When Alex and Angela meet, Angela, who seems to be experienced on blind dates, acts as if she had been disappointed a lot by men. This is mainly due to the fact that she is not looking like most men expect, but Alex seems to have no real problem with it. Latka finds $2000 in the back seat of one of the cabs and the crew does not know if they should return it or not. Suddenly, the boys show up during Alex's date with Angela.

title: Bobby's Acting Career
description: Would be actor Bobby Wheeler made a wager with himself. Bobby had 3 years to make it as an actor and at 24 hours to go,Bobby attends any audition possible to hopefully beat the clock.

title: Come as You Aren't
description: Elaine drives a very rude costumer, who accuses her cheating on the fare. Back at the garage, Elaine invites Alex to come to a party in her apartment, which she gives for the people from the art gallery where she works, but she doesn't want him to tell anyone that they both work as cab drivers, because she is embarrassed. But Alex says he is okay to lie about Elaine's occupation, but he is not okay to lie about him being a cab driver. The rest of the crew sort of invite themselves to the party after hearing about it. But Elaine explicitly says that Louie isn't allowed to come. Elaine makes Alex come over a little earlier so he is the first at the party and he can give her some moral support. Then the guests start to pour in.

title: The Great Line
description: John meets a girl at a bar and to his surprise she likes to have a drink with him. After heading of with her to go bowling, he doesn't show up at work for a few days. After returning, he tells everyone that he got married to the girl he met at the bar. But this doesn't make John very happy.

title: High School Reunion
description: Louie, an outcast in high school, dreads the idea of his class reunion. Wanna-be actor Bobby Wheeler comes up with a scheme to help Louie get even with his peers.

title: Paper Marriage
description: In order for Latka to stay in the country, he gets married to a call girl. The wedding is held in the garage led by the Reverend Jim Ignatowski.

title: Money Troubles
description: When John and his new wife are strapped for money, Alex considers giving them a loan.

title: Men Are Such Beasts
description: Tony is tormented by a crazy, pill-popping, one-time love interest who refuses to break up with him and gets a job at the garage just to be with him.

title: Memories of Cab 804: Part 1
description: After cab driver John Burns has an accident in taxicab #804, the gang at Sunshine Cab, while mechanic Latka is making repairs, talks about memorable customers they encountered in that cab.

title: Memories of Cab 804: Part 2
description: Latka is still trying to repair Cab 804 and the stories of memorable customers the drivers encountered in the cab continue.

title: A Full House for Christmas
description: Louie's gambling brother, Nick from Las Vegas, comes to visit the garage. Irritated that Nick refuses to spend time with their mother, Louie bankrolls Alex in a card game to try and get back at him.

title: Sugar Mama
description: Alex befriends a wealthy elderly lady who pays him to take her around the city.

title: Friends
description: Tony's friendship with Bobby is tested when he leaves town and Bobby mistakenly kills his goldfish.

title: Louie Sees the Light
description: When Louie ends up in the hospital for an operation, he makes a promise to God that if he is able to pull through, he will change his ways. He is quickly tested by an unconvinced Bobby.

title: Elaine and the Lame Duck
description: While out on a fare, Alex befriends a socially inept congressman who is dumped by a woman. Feeling sorry for the guy, Alex fixes him up on a date with Elaine.

title: Bobby's Big Break
description: Actor/cab driver Bobby Wheeler lands a role on a soap opera but the cynical Louie DePalma believes it wont last. Leading Alex to have a serious talk with Louie.

title: Mama Gravas
description: Latka Gravas's mother comes to visit and because he must work, he asks Alex to keep his mother company for him leading Alex to end up with more than he bargained for.

title: Alex Tastes Death and Finds a Nice Restaurant
description: After being shot in his cab, Alex quits the garage and takes a job as a waiter at a high-class French restaurant.

title: Hollywood Calling
description: A Hollywood movie producer comes to the garage to interview and follow cabbies in order to get material for his latest film.

title: Substitute Father
description: With Elaine going out of town to visit her sick aunt, the guys at the garage takes turns watching over her son so that he can compete in a spelling bee.

title: Louie and the Nice Girl
description: Louie is unsure what to do when he starts to date a nice girl that seems to be more than one of his typical one night stands.

title: Honor Thy Father
description: Alex's sister Charlotte turns up at the taxi office to ask him to visit their father Joe, who's seriously ill in hospital. Alex hasn't seen Joe since their mother's funeral, and hasn't spoken to him for 30 years, but eventually gives in.

title: Reverend Jim: A Space Odyssey
description: The guys run into Reverend Jim and try to get him a job, but first they have to convince Louie to hire him and help him pass the exam.

title: Nardo Loses Her Marbles
description: Elaine tries to handle too many things in her life at the same time,bringing her close to a nervous breakdown. This leads her to see a psychiatrist and to look to Alex for possible comfort.

title: Wherefore Art Thou, Bobby?
description: Bobby considers quitting acting after he meets a young actor-wannabe who just moved to New York and immediately lands a leading role in an off-Broadway play.

title: The Lighter Side of Angela Matusa
description: Alex is revisited by a now slimmer Angela whose romantic interest in him has grown since she last saw him a year ago.

title: A Woman Between Friends
description: Bobby and Tony become embattled in a fierce competition for the affections of a girl they both met and asked out at Mario's.

title: The Great Race
description: Alex and Louie engage in a friendly competition to see who can take in the most money. If Louie wins he gets a date with Elaine.

title: The Apartment
description: After his apartment complex is torn down, Latka unknowingly signs a lease to live in a luxurious penthouse for $3,000/month. Realizing that Latka will have to move out after a month, the cabbies decide to spend every minute enjoying the perks of the apartment.

title: Alex's Romance
description: Alex embarks on a romance with a fragile former soap star who is reluctant to get into a long-term relationship.

title: Latka's Revolting
description: After Latka's country erupts into a civil war, he feels that he has a obligation to go home and join the revolution, after all he is a General.

title: Elaine's Secret Admirer
description: Elaine is intrigued when a secret admirer sends her several romantic poems. She soon realizes that it must be someone in the garage.

title: Louie Meets the Folks
description: Fearing that Zena will break up with him, Louie finally decides to meet her parents. He then pays Alex to accompany him and make sure that he doesn't step out of line.

title: Jim Gets a Pet
description: Jim has a good day at the track and decides to spend his winnings on a pet horse.

title: The Reluctant Fighter
description: Tony is initially excited about fighting a former champ whose best days are behind him. His excitement turns to doubt when he realizes that the champ is dedicating the fight to a wheelchair-bound kid.

title: Tony and Brian
description: Tony is shattered when a kid that he wants to adopt decides to go with a wealthy couple.

title: Guess Who's Coming for Brefnish
description: Latka quickly falls in love with Simka, a girl from his country who is now living in New York and is secretly from a different background than he thinks.

title: What Price Bobby?
description: Bobby's acting career is on the rise after he starts having an affair with his new agent.

title: Shut It Down: Part 1
description: Tired of driving ill-fixed cabs, the cabbies go on strike. Louie offers a solution to Elaine, the strike's leader. If she goes out with him, he'll make sure everyone gets what they want.

title: Shut It Down: Part 2
description: Elaine keeps her promise to a date with Louie,so that the drivers demands can be met and end the strike. Despite Louie actually being a gentleman, she's still suspicious of his intent.

title: Alex Jumps Out of an Airplane
description: Following a excitement-filled ski trip, Alex decides to start living life to the fullest, which includes skydiving for the first time.

title: Art Work
description: Upon discussing how an artist's work rises in value after they're gone,Elaine ends up helping the guys try and win a painting at an auction by one who's rumored ill at the time.

title: Fantasy Borough: Part 1
description: After "Fantasy Island" actor Herve Villachez leaves personal photos in Tony's cab, Tony and the rest muse on the idea of life, if fantasies could be real.

title: Fantasy Borough: Part 2
description: The fanciful fantasies of the cabbies continue with a real "show stopper" from Elaine.

title: Louie's Rival
description: Louie finds he & Zena may be growing apart,at the same time that she's made an acquaintance with another man,whom she may be getting serious feelings about.

title: Tony's Sister and Jim
description: Tony Banta's newly divorced sister, Monica, falls in love with Jim Ignatowski much to Tony's dismay.

title: Fathers of the Bride
description: Alex, upset that his ex-wife purposely kept him out of their daughter's wedding, invites Elaine to go with him to crash the reception.

title: Elaine's Strange Triangle
description: Elaine's dating a man who,unknown to her, is actually is a homosexual and attracted to Tony. Tony begs for Alex's help in letting the man down easy.

title: Going Home
description: After a private investigator hired by Jim's father tracks him down, Jim and Alex pay a visit to Jim's father.

title: The Ten Percent Solution
description: With Bobby's acting career going nowhere he takes Tony Banta under his wing and acts as his agent.

title: The Call of the Mild
description: Alex, Tony, and the gang end up stranded without provisions in a mountain cabin when a freak snowstorm and an intrusive bear wreck their well laid plans.

title: Latka's Cookies
description: Following the death of Latka's grandmother he inherits her cookie recipe. He intends on going into business with this recipe, but there's a catch, it contains a special ingredient.

title: Thy Boss' Wife
description: The head boss' wife invites Louie over for an affair so she can get back at her husband. Louie fears the worst after remembering that her last fling, a cabbie, had not been heard from since.

title: The Costume Party
description: The gang crash a party which they believe is occupied by famous actors.

title: Elaine's Old Friend
description: Elaine has the misfortune of picking up her old high school rival, Mary Parker. Later Elaine and Alex meet her and her fiancé for dinner where their romance dominates the night.

title: Out of Commission
description: After Tony's third knockout in five fights, a concerned doctor goes to the boxing commission and convinces them to revoke Tony's license.

title: Zen and the Art of Cab Driving
description: After Jim picks up a couple of businessmen at the airport he realizes that his life is missing something. Focusing on being the best cab driver he can be Jim breaks company trip sheet records amassing enough wealth to achieve goal.

title: Louie's Mother
description: After Louie places his mother in a nursing home he realizes that his vision of living without her was not as good as it seemed.

title: Bobby's Roommate
description: Elaine can't afford her apartment and temporarily moves in with Bobby, much to the chagrin of Alex and Tony.

title: Louie Bumps into an Old Lady
description: After Louie hits an old lady with his cab, she takes him and the Sunshine Cab Company to court for a million dollars. Louie soon realizes that he has a strong case against her when Alex remembers from a prior experience that she is a known ambulance chaser.

title: Bobby and the Critic
description: After reading the newspaper and seeing another nasty review of a play by powerful critic, John Bowman, Bobby decides to compose a letter attacking Bowman, only to reconsider and throw it in the trash. When Louie recovers the letter and sends it to the newspaper, it unexpectedly creates positive buzz for Bobby and his acting career. Bobby now feels the pressure of having to perform his next play with Bowman in the front row.

title: On the Job: Part 1
description: After the Sunshine Cab Company goes bankrupt, the gang decides to meet at Mario's a month later to tell stories about their new jobs.

title: On the Job: Part 2
description: With the Sunshine Cab Company still closed, the former employees continue to share stories of their new jobs.

title: Latka the Playboy
description: Latka creates a suave but obnoxious alter ego, Vic Ferrari, to help him score with the ladies. However, nobody likes his new persona, and Alex tries to convince him to bring the old Latka back.

title: Jim the Psychic
description: Jim has a vision that Alex will die on Thursday at 7 p.m.. Louie is convinced that it is real, but Alex refuses to believe it. Latka is not allowed to talk for a week after a run-in with Tony.

title: Vienna Waits
description: Elaine and Alex travel to Europe together (as friends only)... but it's Elaine and not Alex who ends up having the funnest times and experiences there.

title: Mr. Personalities
description: When Latka begins to exhibit multiple personality disorder again, Elaine refers him to a therapist. As a result of the first session, he takes on a new personality: Alex Rieger.

title: Jim Joins the Network
description: A network executive, in danger of losing his job, uses Jim and his psychic powers to schedule shows. This arrangement does not sit well with Alex, who chastises Jim for being taken advantage of.

title: Louie's Fling
description: Louie jeopardizes his relationship with Zena by sleeping with her vulnerable and intoxicated best friend.

title: Like Father, Like Son
description: When his father returns to the garage for a visit, Alex is once again reluctant to have a relationship with him. They meet for dinner and his father helps set him up on a date with an attractive woman only to ask her out himself after Alex leaves.

title: Louie's Mom Remarries
description: Louie is appalled and devastated when his elderly mother announces her plans to marry a Japanese man she met at her senior citizens' group.

title: Fledgling
description: Elaine befriends a reclusive artist who is afraid to leave his apartment. She decides to take him to the garage to help him overcome his fears.

title: Of Mice and Tony
description: Tony meets a promising young heavyweight boxer and offers to become his manager; the problem is, a mysterious "syndicate" is also showing an interest in the rookie fighter.

title: Louie Goes Too Far
description: Louie gets fired after Elaine accuses him of voyeurism.

title: I Wanna Be Around
description: Louie, fearful of an apocalypse, starts building a "doom room" to survive a catastrophic event.

title: Bobby Doesn't Live Here Anymore
description: After leaving the garage six months ago to pursue his acting career, Bobby Wheeler returns with news that his pilot has been picked up by a network. However, when he later learns that his part was recast, he is afraid that he might have to beg Louie for his job back.

title: Nina Loves Alex
description: Alex plays hard to get when a young, upbeat new cab driver shows a romantic interest in him.

title: Tony's Lady
description: Tony takes a part time job as chauffeur for a charming young socialite and finds himself falling in love with her.

title: Simka Returns
description: Latka's girlfriend Simka is back in New York, but can their romance be successfully rekindled once his other personalities - especially lounge lizard Vic Ferrari - begin to vie for her attentions?

title: Jim and the Kid
description: When a runaway boy is discovered in the back of a cab, Jim takes him home and decides to adopt him and raise him as his own son, naively unaware that such a course is impossible and illegal.

title: Take My Ex-Wife, Please
description: Tony invites Alex to make up the numbers for a double-date with two attractive twins. Matters take a turn for the worst when the Rev. Jim turns up unexpectedly and Alex spots his ex-wife Phyllis, fresh out of her second divorce.

title: The Unkindest Cut
description: Elaine decides to treat herself to an expensive hairstyle, but the results leave her in tears. Uncharacteristically, Louis leaps to her defence, but Alex persuades Elaine she needs to stand up for herself.

title: Tony's Comeback
description: With the help of a new cab driver, Bubba Smith, Tony's boxing career goes on the rise.

title: Elegant Iggy
description: Elaine is invited to a high society dinner, with Jim as her date.

title: The Wedding of Latka and Simka
description: Latka and Simka have a wedding in the garage and at the wedding Simka must pass a test to prove she's chaste.

title: Cooking for Two
description: After Reverend Jim's building gets knocked down he moves in with Louie; unfortunately for Louie he asks Jim to cook something for dinner.

title: The Road Not Taken: Part 1
description: Jim, Tony, Louie share their past, as to what led them to where they are today.

title: The Road Not Taken: Part 2
description: Latka, and Alex share their past, as for how they got where they are now.

title: Love Un-American Style
description: Simka sets everyone up with their soul mates as part of her cultural tradition.

title: Jim's Inheritance
description: After Jim's father dies he is visited by the probate for his father's estate.

title: Alex Goes Off the Wagon
description: Alex has a gambling problem again.

title: Scenskees from a Marriage: Part 1
description: Latka has an affair with another cab driver putting his marriage in jeopardy.

title: Scenskees from a Marriage: Part 2
description: Simka has a dilemma as to which cab driver she is going to sleep with so she and Latka hold an informal dinner party.

title: Crime and Punishment
description: Realizing the boss has found out that someone has embezzled money from the cab company, Louie convinces Jeff to take the blame for him in hopes that the controversy will blow over. However, the plan goes awry when Jeff is fired and put in jail.

title: Alex the Gofer
description: After Alex drives a producer and director to a local theater he attempts to get a job as their gopher.

title: Louie's Revenge
description: One of Louie's old flames calls heartbroken from a bar. He meets up with her intending to get revenge for rudely dumping him, however things don't go as planned.

title: Travels with My Dad
description: Tony takes the opportunity to join his father on a voyage with the merchant marine.

title: Elaine and the Monk
description: Simka's visiting cousin Zifka is a monk who is allowed to break his vow of silence and sample worldly pleasures for one week every ten years. Zifka and Elaine find romance during that all-too-short week.

title: Zena's Honeymoon
description: After initially ignoring an invitation to attend Zena's wedding, Louie has regrets so he crashes her wedding cruise.

title: Get Me Through the Holidays
description: Alex is visited by his ex-wife, who not only has the holiday blues she refuses to let anyone else have merry spirits, especially Alex.

title: Louie Moves Uptown
description: Louies has a revelation, he lives like he is so he sets his sights on a high rise condo. All he needs to do is borrow money from Jim and beat out Penny Marshall for the flat.

title: Alex's Old Buddy
description: When Alex learns that his old dog is dying, he determines to do everything in his power to make Buddy's last days comfortable.

title: Sugar Ray Nardo
description: Elaines son takes on boxing with a little encouragement from Tony Banta.

title: A Taxi Celebration: Part 1
description: Clips from Taxi over its 5 season run are hosted & presented by Danny DeVito.

title: A Taxi Celebration: Part 2
description: The drive down Taxi's 5th season memory lane continues with Danny DeVito as host.

title: Alex Gets Burned by an Old Flame
description: Jim's old flame from the "peace & love" days of the 60s walks back into his life but it may be Alex who ends up with warm-hearted feelings for her.

title: Louie and the Blind Girl
description: Louie is in love and plans to propose to his blind girlfriend Judy. When he learns that an operation may restore her sight, he is suddenly very self-conscious about his looks.

title: Arnie Meets the Kids
description: Elaine's has dated Arnie for sometime and wants him to meet her children. Arnie has reservations about how well he'll get along with them..

title: Tony's Baby
description: Tony finds out that his girlfriend might be pregnant.

title: Jim's Mario's
description: Jim buys out their local hangout, Mario's. He has big plans but things aren't looking up, especially since his brother has made a surprise appearance.

title: A Grand Gesture
description: Jim is attacked by the gang back at the garage about the amount of money he is recklessly giving away. Jim's solution, he will give them all $1000 each to give away.

title: Simka's Monthlies
description: Simka fails to show up for another citizenship appointment. Latka explains, back at the garage, that she is suffering from her "kremkapush" which consists of craving for salt and erratic behavior.
